verses.verse: Now it came to pass, when <S%H139>Adoni-zedek<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> had <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>how<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had <S%H3920>taken<s%> <S%H5857>Ai<s%>, and had utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> it; as he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> and her <S%H4428>king<s%>, so he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai<s%> and her <S%H4428>king<s%>; and how the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> had made <S%H7999>peace<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and were <S%H7130>among<s%> them;

That they <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%>, because <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, as <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H4467>royal<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and because it was <S%H1419>greater<s%> than <S%H5857>Ai<s%>, and all the <S%H582>men<s%> thereof were <S%H1368>mighty<s%>.

Wherefore <S%H139>Adoni-zedek<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto <S%H1944>Hoham<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, and unto <S%H6502>Piram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3412>Jarmuth<s%>, and unto <S%H3309>Japhia<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3923>Lachish<s%>, and unto <S%H1688>Debir<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5700>Eglon<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Come <S%H5927>up<s%> unto me, and <S%H5826>help<s%> me, that we may <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%>: for it hath made <S%H7999>peace<s%> with <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Therefore the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3412>Jarmuth<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3923>Lachish<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5700>Eglon<s%>, gathered themselves <S%H622>together<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%>, they and all their <S%H4264>hosts<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> before <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%>, and made <S%H3898>war<s%> against it.

¶ And the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7503>Slack<s%> not thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> from thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>; come <S%H5927>up<s%> to us <S%H4120>quickly<s%>, and <S%H3467>save<s%> us, and <S%H5826>help<s%> us: for all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> are gathered <S%H6908>together<s%> against us.
So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5927>ascended<s%> from <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>, he, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> with him, and all the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men of <S%H2428>valour<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> them not: for I have <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>; there shall not a <S%H376>man<s%> of them <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee.
<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> therefore <S%H935>came<s%> unto them <S%H6597>suddenly<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> all <S%H3915>night<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2000>discomfited<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H5221>slew<s%> them with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%> at <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%>, and <S%H7291>chased<s%> them along the <S%H1870>way<s%> that goeth <S%H4608>up<s%> to <S%H1032>Beth-horon<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> them to <S%H5825>Azekah<s%>, and unto <S%H4719>Makkedah<s%>.

And it came to pass, as they <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and were in the going <S%H4174>down<s%> to <S%H1032>Beth-horon<s%>, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> cast <S%H7993>down<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> upon them unto <S%H5825>Azekah<s%>, and they <S%H4191>died<s%>: they were <S%H7227>more<s%> which <S%H4191>died<s%> with <S%H1259%H68>hailstones<s%> than they <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2026>slew<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

¶ Then <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> delivered <S%H5414>up<s%> the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and he <S%H559>said<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H8121>Sun<s%>, stand thou <S%H1826>still<s%> upon <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%>; and thou, <S%H3394>Moon<s%>, in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H357>Ajalon<s%>.

And the <S%H8121>sun<s%> stood <S%H1826>still<s%>, and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> <S%H5975>stayed<s%>, until the <S%H1471>people<s%> had <S%H5358>avenged<s%> themselves upon their <S%H341>enemies<s%>. Is not <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H3477>Jasher<s%>? So the <S%H8121>sun<s%> stood <S%H5975>still<s%> in the <S%H2677>midst<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H213>hasted<s%> not to go <S%H935>down<s%> about a <S%H8549>whole<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And there was no <S%H3117>day<s%> like that <S%H6440>before<s%> it or <S%H310>after<s%> it, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
¶ And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%>, and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with him, unto the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>.
But these <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%>, and <S%H2244>hid<s%> themselves in a <S%H4631>cave<s%> at <S%H4719>Makkedah<s%>.
And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> are <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2244>hid<s%> in a <S%H4631>cave<s%> at <S%H4719>Makkedah<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1556>Roll<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> upon the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H4631>cave<s%>, and <S%H6485>set<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> by it for to <S%H8104>keep<s%> them:

And <S%H5975>stay<s%> ye not, but <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and smite the <S%H2179>hindmost<s%> of them; <S%H5414>suffer<s%> them not to <S%H935>enter<s%> into their <S%H5892>cities<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And it came to pass, when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H5221>slaying<s%> them with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%>, till they were <S%H8552>consumed<s%>, that the <S%H8300>rest<s%> which <S%H8277>remained<s%> of them <S%H935>entered<s%> into <S%H4013>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> at <S%H4719>Makkedah<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>: none <S%H2782>moved<s%> his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> against <S%H376>any<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, <S%H6605>Open<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H4631>cave<s%>, and bring <S%H3318>out<s%> those <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> unto me out of the <S%H4631>cave<s%>.

And they <S%H6213>did<s%> so, and brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> those <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> unto him out of the <S%H4631>cave<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3412>Jarmuth<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3923>Lachish<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5700>Eglon<s%>.

And it came to pass, when they brought <S%H3318>out<s%> those <S%H4428>kings<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H7101>captains<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> which <S%H1980>went<s%> with him, Come <S%H7126>near<s%>, <S%H7760>put<s%> your <S%H7272>feet<s%> upon the <S%H6677>necks<s%> of these <S%H4428>kings<s%>. And they came <S%H7126>near<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> their <S%H7272>feet<s%> upon the <S%H6677>necks<s%> of them.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not, nor be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%>, be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of good <S%H553>courage<s%>: for thus shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to all your <S%H341>enemies<s%> against whom ye <S%H3898>fight<s%>.

And <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> them, and <S%H4191>slew<s%> them, and <S%H8518>hanged<s%> them on <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%>: and they were <S%H8518>hanging<s%> upon the <S%H6086>trees<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening<s%>.

And it came to pass at the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the going <S%H935>down<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%>, and they took them <S%H3381>down<s%> off the <S%H6086>trees<s%>, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them into the <S%H4631>cave<s%> wherein they had been <S%H2244>hid<s%>, and <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> in the <S%H4631>cave's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, which remain until this <S%H6106>very<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

¶ And that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H4719>Makkedah<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%> thereof he utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%>, them, and all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that were therein; he <S%H7604>let<s%> none <S%H8300>remain<s%>: and he <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4719>Makkedah<s%> as he <S%H6213>did<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>.
Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> from <S%H4719>Makkedah<s%>, and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with him, unto <S%H3841>Libnah<s%>, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3841>Libnah<s%>:

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it also, and the <S%H4428>king<s%> thereof, into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and he <S%H5221>smote<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that were therein; he <S%H7604>let<s%> none <S%H8300>remain<s%> in it; but <S%H6213>did<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> thereof as he <S%H6213>did<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>.

¶ And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> from <S%H3841>Libnah<s%>, and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with him, unto <S%H3923>Lachish<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> against it, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against it:

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H3923>Lachish<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which <S%H3920>took<s%> it on the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that were therein, according to all that he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3841>Libnah<s%>.

¶ Then <S%H2036>Horam<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1507>Gezer<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H3923>Lachish<s%>; and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> him and his <S%H5971>people<s%>, until he had <S%H7604>left<s%> him none <S%H8300>remaining<s%>.

¶ And from <S%H3923>Lachish<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> unto <S%H5700>Eglon<s%>, and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with him; and they <S%H2583>encamped<s%> against it, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against it:

And they <S%H3920>took<s%> it on that <S%H3117>day<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that were therein he utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%>, according to all that he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3923>Lachish<s%>.
And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H5700>Eglon<s%>, and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with him, unto <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>; and they <S%H3898>fought<s%> against it:

And they <S%H3920>took<s%> it, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%> thereof, and all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof, and all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that were therein; he <S%H7604>left<s%> none <S%H8300>remaining<s%>, according to all that he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H5700>Eglon<s%>; but <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> it utterly, and all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that were therein.
¶ And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%>, and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with him, to <S%H1688>Debir<s%>; and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against it:

And he <S%H3920>took<s%> it, and the <S%H4428>king<s%> thereof, and all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof; and they <S%H5221>smote<s%> them with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that were therein; he <S%H7604>left<s%> none <S%H8300>remaining<s%>: as he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, so he <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H1688>Debir<s%>, and to the <S%H4428>king<s%> thereof; as he had <S%H6213>done<s%> also to <S%H3841>Libnah<s%>, and to her <S%H4428>king<s%>.

¶ So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> all the <S%H776>country<s%> of the <S%H2022>hills<s%>, and of the <S%H5045>south<s%>, and of the <S%H8219>vale<s%>, and of the <S%H794>springs<s%>, and all their <S%H4428>kings<s%>: he <S%H7604>left<s%> none <S%H8300>remaining<s%>, but utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> all that <S%H5397>breathed<s%>, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.
And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> them from <S%H6947>Kadesh-barnea<s%> even unto <S%H5804>Gaza<s%>, and all the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen<s%>, even unto <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%>.

And all these <S%H4428>kings<s%> and their <S%H776>land<s%> did <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3920>take<s%> at <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6471>time<s%>, because the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%>, and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with him, unto the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>.
